author: Special Correspondent
text:
Police arrested 82 sacked ‘Makkal Nala Paniyaalargal’ including two women here on Tuesday when they started begging in front of Tirunelveli Railway Junction to highlight their demand of reinstatement in service.

Led by V. Puthiyavan, state secretary of Tamil Nadu MNP Sangam, the protestors started begging in front of Tirunelveli Junction only to be arrested by the police.

They were released in the evening.
title: 82 protesters arrested
